channel.title: Unlimited Pk - Needs Development Team
channel.description:
Hey, I'm looking for some people who know how to make a Webclient, GFX, and a nice Website for the server. Pictures below...
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/1zb8lu0.png[/img]
[i]*Features:[/i]
*[u]Chaotic Rapier [/u] and [u]Longsword[/u] *[u]PVP Weapons [/u] and [u]Armour[/u] *[u]Spirit shields[/u] *Amazing [u]hybriding[/u] and [u]pking[/u] *[u]Turmoil[/u] *[u]Staff of light[/u] *[u]Berserker ring (i), Archers Ring (i), Warriors Ring (i), Seers Ring (i)[/u] *[u]Economy[/u] based *All working [u]specs[/u] and with [u]D Claws[/u] and [u]PVP weapons[/u] too[/u] *100% [u]Duel Arena[/u] *100% [u]Godwars[/u] *ALL Basic [u]minigames[/u] - [u]Pest control, barrows, fight caves, Duel arena[/u] *PVP [u]Bosses[/u] - Kill them in high level wildy for [u]PVP Drops[/u] such as [u]Artefacts[/u] and [u]PVP Armor[/u] *[u]Artefacts[/u] - Working 100% - Click an [u]artefact[/u] to recieve your cash *The Best Private Server you can find - Join today and look below for more!
[IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/EQUIPMENTSTATS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/DCLAWS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/AGSBLITZ.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/VESTALONG.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/STATIUSWARHAMMEER.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/sTAKING.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/WINSTAKER.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/ITEMS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/turmoil.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/SPECIALATTACK.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/PARTYROOM.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/PREMIUMISLE.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp243/lilxaj96/Unlimited%20Pk/JOINTODA.jpg[/img]
Owner of Unlimited Pk: AJ Co-Owner of Unlimited Pk: Jonny Admins of Unlimited Pk: Dizzy Combo, Jacob, Timmy. Mods of Unlimited Pk: Momn456, Kyxc, Josh Development Team of Unlimited Pk (Looking for more): AJ, Jonny
Thanks and here's the application:
[code]Name:
Experience?
What you are applying for Webclient, GFX, Website?:
How long have you been doing what you are applying for:
Location:
How will i get a hold of you: [/code]

item.title: Unlimited Pk - Needs Development Team
item.dc:creator: @archerkill30 archerkill30
item.description:
@archerkill30 wrote:

Name: Alex

Experience? I ran a server about 2 years ago. Still know the basics just getting back into server development.

What you are applying for Webclient, GFX, Website?: Hoster and helping a little with client/server

How long have you been doing what you are applying for: I have spent months on end coding a good server updating it a lot and it wa very successful. people kept on ddosing the server so I had to stop…

Location: Canada

How will i get a hold of you:
Msn Or skype. Message me or reply back with your msn or skype. I don’t want my e-mail public.

Read full topic

item.title: Unlimited Pk - Needs Development Team
item.dc:creator: @ajisamazing ajisamazing
item.description:
@ajisamazing wrote:

Hey, I’m looking for some people who know how to make a Webclient, GFX, and a nice Website for the server. Pictures below…

1zb8lu0.png1200×105

*Features:

*Chaotic Rapier and Longsword
*PVP Weapons and Armour
*Spirit shields
*Amazing hybriding and pking
*Turmoil
*Staff of light
*Berserker ring (i), Archers Ring (i), Warriors Ring (i), Seers Ring (i)
*Economy based
*All working specs and with D Claws and PVP weapons too[/u]
*100% Duel Arena
*100% Godwars
*ALL Basic minigames - Pest control, barrows, fight caves, Duel arena
*PVP Bosses - Kill them in high level wildy for PVP Drops such as Artefacts and PVP Armor
*Artefacts - Working 100% - Click an artefact to recieve your cash
*The Best Private Server you can find - Join today and look below for more!
